Author: Pistachio Herald
Name: Autogardener
Punchline: Tend to your plot in one click
Description: Tend to your plot in one click. Type /autog to start.
Changelog:
- Fixed seeds and soils indexes being mixed. Woopsie.
- Fixed having flowerpot-only seeds messing up planting outdoors
- Added support for flowerpots
- Added support for french and german language clients
- Planting with the plugin now also updates the data for the plot
- The button to create a new design now mentions the number of slots in the nearest plot, instead of the name
